I purchased the Red Rhinestone pair and they Do Give Hollywood Glam! They were securely packaged and came with a nice case and cleaning cloth. Buyer Beware that the lenses in these sunglasses are NOT POLARIZED! Imagine wearing Red Sunglasses while Driving, and EVERYTHING in your field of view is the Color of your Lenses - RED?! (Or whatever color you’ve bought). Is the Traffic Light Red or Not??? No Thanks; I’m All in for the Glam Vibes, but these are Not Practical and frankly Not Safe to wear while driving or in situations where Accurate Color Discernment is Necessary.
